wikipedia_page.main:
Keith Christopher Whiley (born 3 October 1948) is a former multi-sport Paralympian from Great Britain and is the father of wheelchair tennis player Jordanne Whiley. In the 1984 Summer Paralympics he took part in athletics and shooting. He suffers the same disease as his daughter, osteogenesis imperfecta.
He won the bronze medal in Men's 100 m L3 1984 Summer Paralympics.
